MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH44 and CH45 postcode area of Wallasey affecting properties in Mosslands Drive, Burton Avenue, Stonehouse Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 5:45am. Restoration is taking longer than expected because of investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:55am on 17th March 2021.
